mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_POINT, PROFILE_IMG, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_DEL_FL, AUTHORITY, SOCIAL_LOGIN_TYPE FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND SOCIAL_LOGIN_TYPE = 'D'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{inputId} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
UNION ALL
SELECT PARTNER_ID FROM PARTNER WHERE PARTNER_ID = #{inputId} AND PARTNER_DEL_FL != 'Y' )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{inputNickname} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{inputEmail} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_TEL = #{inputTel} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "MEMBER" VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberTel}, #{memberAddr}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
